title: 15 inch retina a1398 sometimes display sometimes not any idea?
message: Hi guys. I have strange macbook here a1398 model. is have problem with display. Sometimes when i press power button i can hear sound but no picture. Today i done this same and is powering up and display no problem. I done all reset pram and smc but this problem is coming back sometimes. Any idea why is like that?

title: 15 inch retina a1398 sometimes display sometimes not any idea?
15 inch retina a1398 sometimes display sometimes not any idea?
message: Yeah, bad GPU. But you are on your own from Jan. 1st. N13E-GT chip.
